hero.title: Find the perfect match
hero.description: A system based on competency and organizational culture analysis that connects candidates with employers based on real compatibility – not just a CV.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to finding the perfect match
howItWorks.step1Description: Answer honestly about your competencies and work culture preferences. There are no wrong answers!
howItWorks.step2Description: Our algorithm compares your profile with employer offerings, considering competencies, culture, and contextual data.
howItWorks.step3Description: See the companies that best match you, along with a detailed compatibility analysis.

benefits.candidate1: Discover your strengths and professional preferences
benefits.candidate2: Receive offers tailored to your profile
benefits.candidate3: Find a place where you'll truly fit in
benefits.employer1: Define the ideal candidate profile based on competencies
benefits.employer2: Receive candidates matched to your company culture

values.title: Our values
values.subtitle: We believe honesty is the key to the best match
values.value1Description: Every answer is valuable. We don't judge – we match.
values.value2Description: The more authentic your answers, the better the match.
values.value3Description: We're looking for a place where you can truly grow.

prototype.notice: This tool is a prototype based on surveys and low-budget solutions. We're testing assumptions and checking if the solution works correctly. Thank you for participating – your answers truly impact the project's development.

expert.description: Tests developed by psychologists and HR specialists

cta.title: Ready for the perfect match?
cta.description: Join us and find a workplace that truly fits you.

login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to continue
login.errorMessage: An error occurred while logging in

register.title: Create account
register.subtitle: Choose account type and fill out the form
register.successMessage: Account created! Check your email to confirm registration.

dashboard.introSubtitle: Discover your potential and see how much you can really achieve.
dashboard.introGreeting: You're now starting to create your profile in our recruitment service prototype. Answering the questions will take about 25 minutes, so find a place where no one will disturb you during this time.
dashboard.introGreetingShort: Creating your profile takes about 25 minutes. Find a quiet place where no one will disturb you.
dashboard.introPoint1: 5 competency forms whose results will reflect the professional preferences of a potential candidate
dashboard.introPoint2: Work culture assessment - what conditions and atmosphere are in your company
dashboard.introPoint3: Questions about potential candidate's experience and required industry or work experience if the position requires it
dashboard.introReminder: Remember - there are no right or wrong answers. We're assessing the match between the company and the ideal candidate. Be honest and you'll gain more and find a needle in a haystack :)
dashboard.introReminderShort: No right or wrong answers – just be honest!
dashboard.honestReminder: Remember: there are no right or wrong answers. Honesty improves match quality.
dashboard.doCompetencyTests: Complete competency tests to discover your strengths
dashboard.doCultureTest: Great! Now it's time for the organizational culture test
dashboard.doAdditionalQuestions: Just a few more additional questions
dashboard.allTestsCompleted: Congratulations! All tests completed. We're finding matches for you.
dashboard.cultureTestDescription: Discover what work environment suits you
dashboard.profileCompleteTitle: Thank you for completing the tests!
dashboard.profileCompleteDescription: Your profile is fully ready to match you with your ideal workplace. Don't worry, we'll take care of the hard work.
dashboard.profileCompleteEmail: Within 24 hours, you'll receive an email with your test results.
dashboard.profileCompleteMatch: If there's demand for your competencies in our database, we'll immediately notify you by email about the match with an employer.
dashboard.searchingMatchesDescription: Now it's our turn. We'll be looking for your ideal employer. When a matched offer appears, you'll receive a notification.

matches.title: Matched employers
matches.subtitle: List of companies that best match your profile.
matches.searchingDescription: We don't have any employers matching your profile yet. When we find suitable companies, they'll appear here.

feedback.title: Share your feedback
feedback.subtitle: Your opinion will help us refine our idea to make it even better.
feedback.whyImportant: Your honest feedback will help us decide whether to develop this project further or change direction. Every answer matters!
feedback.overallExperience: How would you rate your overall experience with our tool?
feedback.wouldRecommend: Would you recommend this tool to friends?
feedback.easeOfUse: How would you rate the ease of use?
feedback.mostUseful: What was most valuable for you?
feedback.mostUsefulPlaceholder: E.g., learning about my competencies, clear questions, quick to complete...
feedback.improvementsPlaceholder: E.g., tests too long, unclear questions, lack of instructions...
feedback.additionalCommentsPlaceholder: Anything else you'd like to share...
feedback.thankYouDescription: Your response is very valuable to us and will help us improve the tool.

test.resultReminder: Remember: there are no good or bad results. This test helps us match you to the right workplace.
test.rateStatement: Rate how much you agree with the following statement
test.answerHonestly: Remember: there are no right or wrong answers. Answer honestly!
test.cultureResultsHelp: These results will help us find an organization whose work culture best matches your preferences.

additional.title: Additional questions
additional.subtitle: Last step! Provide some information about your experience.
additional.searchIndustriesLabel: Which industries are you looking for work? *
additional.searchIndustriesHint: Select industries you'd like to work in (max. 3)
additional.searchIndustriesHintWithExp: Industries from your experience were added automatically. You can remove or add others.
additional.selectAtLeastOneIndustry: Please select at least one industry
additional.allCompleted: All tests and questions have been completed
additional.ourTurnDescription: We'll be looking for your ideal employer. When a matched offer appears, you'll receive a notification.
additional.thankYouMessage: Thank you for completing all the tests!

dashboard.title: Employer dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Define your ideal candidate profile and find people who best fit your organization.
dashboard.introGreeting: Creating your profile will take about 25 minutes. Find a quiet place where no one will disturb you.
dashboard.introReminder: There are no right or wrong answers – be honest and you'll find a needle in a haystack!
dashboard.startWithRole: Start by describing the role you want to fill
dashboard.defineRequirements: Great! Now define the required competencies
dashboard.doCultureTest: Just the organizational culture test left
dashboard.profileComplete: Profile complete! We're searching for candidates.
dashboard.profileCompleteTitle: Thank you for completing the forms!
dashboard.profileCompleteDescription: Your profile is fully ready to match you with the ideal candidate. Don't worry, we'll take care of the hard work.
dashboard.profileCompleteEmail: Within 24 hours, you'll receive an email with a summary of the completed forms.
dashboard.profileCompleteMatch: If a candidate matching your expectations appears in our database, we'll immediately notify you by email.
dashboard.searchingCandidatesDescription: We're now working on finding the ideal candidate. When we find one, you'll receive a notification.

role.title: Role description
role.roleDescriptionPlaceholder: We're looking for a UX Designer who will help us design intuitive digital products...
role.responsibilitiesLabel: What will the candidate be doing?
role.responsibilitiesPlaceholder:
• interface design (web/mobile)
• creating mockups and prototypes
• user needs analysis

requirements.title: Position requirements
requirements.acceptOtherIndustries: I'm open to candidates from other industries
requirements.addIndustriesHint: Add industries with experience and position level requirements
requirements.acceptedIndustriesHint: Add industries with experience and position level requirements
requirements.fillAcceptedIndustries: Please fill details for accepted industries

culture.title: Organizational work culture
culture.rateStatement: Rate how well the following statement describes your organization
culture.profileCompletedDescription: We're now working on finding the ideal candidate. When we find one, you'll receive a notification.

feedback.title: Share your feedback
feedback.subtitle: Your feedback will help us improve the tool for employers.
feedback.whyImportant: We're developing our idea and checking if it works in a way that connects the right candidate with the right employer. Every feedback from you is valuable to us!
feedback.thankYouDescription: Your response is very valuable to us and will help us improve the tool.

orderDetail.detailsDescription: Information about the order and its status
orderDetail.noCandidatesYet: No matches yet – searching for candidates

candidates.title: Matched candidates
candidates.subtitle: List of candidates who best match your organization profile.
candidates.searchingDescription: We don't have any candidates matching your profile yet. When we find suitable people, they'll appear here.

candidateDetail.whyGoodMatch: Why is this a good match?
candidateDetail.matchExplanation: {{name}} shows {{percent}}% compatibility with your organization profile. Here are the key areas of alignment:

offers.title: Job Offers
offers.subtitle: Manage your job listings
offers.noOffersDescription: You don't have any job offers yet. Create your first offer to start matching candidates.
offers.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All matches related to this offer will be removed.

offerForm.titleHint: This name will be displayed on your dashboard in the orders list
offerForm.profileCompleteDescription: We're now working on finding the ideal candidate. When we find one, you'll receive a notification.
offerForm.titleMinLength: Role name must be at least 3 characters
offerForm.titleLettersOnly: Role name can only contain letters

profile.title: Company Profile
profile.subtitle: Your company information visible to candidates
